p_train.help: Fraction of the training data. The remainder is assigned to the validation data.

n_exp.help: Number of training repetitions resampling the dataset.

attribute_in.help: Input attribute in two-dimensional tensor format (arrays).

state.help: Considers or not the state coming from the stream.

Simple Convolution Network.help: Neural Network with one convolution layer, one max pooling and 3 feedforwards. This neural network is suitable for classification of texts transformed from Word Embeddings.
